definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: cause (perh. orig. circumstance, cf. Sab. [[אוד]] enclosing wall)—only pl. [[אוֹדׂת]] Ge 21:11 +; [[אׂדוֹת]] Nu 12:1 +; (8 t. + 2Sa 13:16 vid. infra); [[אׂדוֹתַי]] Jos 14:6; [[אׂדוֹתֶיךָ]] ib.;—cause, alw. with [[על]], & cstr., exc. Je 3:8, where sq. [[אֲשֶׁר]]; ´[[עַל־א]] because of  Ge 21:11, Ge 21:25, Ex 18:8, Nu 12:1, Nu 13:24, Ju Jdg 6:7, Je 3:8; = concerning (on occasion of) Ge 26:32, Jos 14:6, Jos 14:6; in 2Sa 13:16 rd., for [[אל־אׂדוֹת]], [[אַל אָחִי כִּי]] LXXL It. We Dr.
